title: Step Matching
content: Example:The measure of namemm_name, defined by expressioneditDistance(pivot.name, candidate.name)is used in some rule's expressionmeasures.mm_name < 3 and pivot.city == candidate.city,and in other rule's expressionmeasures.mm_name < 2 and editDistance(pivot.city, candidate.city) < 2.The use of matching measures is identical in Matching and Unification step.
